author: veithen
msg: Use SNAPSHOT versions of the mar and aar plugins because usage of the 1.5.1 versions results in corruption of the local Maven repository (when starting the build with a local repository that does not contain all the dependencies of the plugins yet). See the comment inside the POM for more details.
